settings.label: OUR STORY
settings.heading: About Exodus Breeders
settings.subtitle: Trusted partners in professional breeding, built on experience and refined through practice.

settings.heading: Our Mission
settings.body: To deliver professional-grade reproductive supplies supported by knowledgeable technical guidance and exceptional customer service.

settings.heading: Field-Tested
settings.body: Every equine and canine product is tested within our own breeding program. Real-world performance is our standard.

settings.heading: Reliable
settings.body: In reproductive work, reliability is non-negotiable. We ensure every shipment meets the demands of time-sensitive programs.

settings.heading: Expert Support
settings.body: Our team brings decades of industry knowledge. We're partners in your breeding program, not just a supplier.

settings.name: Customer Reviews Awards
settings.description: Fast shipping, Expert support & easy reordering.

settings.name: Compliance Audit
settings.description: Certified by the Pharmacy Quality Alliance (PQA).

settings.name: Top Digital Pharmacy
settings.description: Awarded by the National Pharmacy Association.

settings.heading: Meet the Experts Behind the Prescriptions

settings.name: Mike Weaver
settings.bio:
Mike founded Exodus Breeders with a vision to provide professional-grade reproductive supplies to the equine and canine breeding industry.

With decades of hands-on experience in breeding programs, Mike understands the critical importance of reliable supplies and knowledgeable support.

settings.name: Karen Weaver
settings.bio:
Karen joined Exodus Breeders in 2014 and plays a critical role in ensuring the quality and consistency of our shipping systems. She personally assembles every equine and canine transport container that leaves our facility, maintaining the standards our customers depend on.

Her attention to detail and commitment to reliability ensure that each shipment meets the demands of time-sensitive breeding programs.

Karen is married to Mike and is the proud mother of two daughters, Jaidyn and Jenna.
